category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VendorRevision_PseudoFolder
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed as a pseudo folder under a node for VendorRevision objects. This preference can be set using the preference name as an environment variable. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values; each string must be a property of VendorRevision.
